TopicTitle: Is there a way to change part description units?

Articles.Content:
I am using mks/oks mod for colonization. some of the parts have input/outputs with units in #/day show in the part info screen. When displayed in this way, the number is rounded to 0. If you look at the part config it is actually in a different unit - #/sec.

Is there a way to change the units or have it display the full number vice rounding to 0.
